channel.title: Why does Grafana Cloud stop collecting metrics after I upgrade my node to 1.1.0?
channel.description:
The endpoint for the Prometheus / Grafana metrics has changed from `/metrics` to `/prometheus/metrics` from version 1.1.0 onwards.
You will need to modify your `/etc/grafana-agent.yaml` file to include the `metrics_path: /prometheus/metrics` under the `job_name` row:
Before: ```yaml prometheus: configs: - name: integrations scrape_configs: - job_name: my_job_name static_configs: ... ```
After: ```yaml prometheus: configs: - name: integrations scrape_configs: - job_name: my_job_name metrics_path: /prometheus/metrics static_configs: ... ```

item.title: Why does Grafana Cloud stop collecting metrics after I upgrade my node to 1.1.0?
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
The endpoint for the Prometheus / Grafana metrics has changed from /metrics to /prometheus/metrics from version 1.1.0 onwards.

You will need to modify your /etc/grafana-agent.yaml file to include the metrics_path: /prometheus/metrics under the job_name row:

Before:

prometheus:
  configs:
  - name: integrations
    scrape_configs:
      - job_name: my_job_name
        static_configs:
...

After:

prometheus:
  configs:
  - name: integrations
    scrape_configs:
      - job_name: my_job_name
        metrics_path: /prometheus/metrics
        static_configs:
...
